name: Shona Music
description: Music of the Shona people, a Bantu ethnic group who form a majority population in Zimbabwe.

children.name: Chimurenga
children.description: Popular style from Zimbabwe based on the traditional mbira thumb piano, but with electric instrumentation as well.

children.name: Shona Mbira Music
children.description: Traditional music based on cyclical patterns played on the mbira, from which long instrumental parts are improvised.
